fields.description: Complete directory of people and organisations related to phage research. A central directory of people allow us to manage access to projects and ensure that appropriate staff are linked, credited, and named according to their preferred name.
fields.name: Directory
Search
fields.description: Unified search for the CPT's Phage Database, allowing you to find your samples, proteins, and phages

fields.name: Bioproject Management
fields.description: Apollo & Galaxy! The CPT's innovative bioproject management will let you accomplish tasks like selecting a subset of genomes from a database, delegating employees to work on their annotations and analysis, and then merging results into the shared database. Allows for storage, management, and analysis of complex structured data.
